text: Bampada Mukherjee was an Indian politician. He was elected as MLA of Hirapur Vidhan Sabha Constituency in 1969, 1971, 1977 and 1982. He was the first Mayor of Asansol Municipal Corporation. He died on 13 April 2019 at the age of 97. ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:West Bengal MLAs 1969–1971 Category:West Bengal MLAs 1971–1972 Category:West Bengal MLAs 1977–1982 Category:West Bengal MLAs 1982–1987 Category:Mayors of places in West Bengal
title: Bamapada Mukherjee
